title: Herald of Tiamat
description:
Herald of Tiamat: A Descent into Avernus Adventure
Unleash the fury of dragons and step into a world of ancient deities and infernal plots with "Herald of Tiamat," a thrilling Dungeons & Dragons adventure designed for 5th to 6th level characters. This adventure seamlessly integrates into the "Baldur's Gate: Descent into Avernus" campaign but can also serve as a standalone experience or be adapted for other campaigns involving the formidable Tiamat.

Adventure Synopsis:
When Elturel was dragged into the Nine Hells, it became a new battleground in the eternal Blood War. Amidst this chaos, the ancient enmity between the draconic deities Bahamut and Tiamat reignites. Tiamat, chained within Avernus, cannot tolerate the presence of a temple dedicated to her nemesis, Bahamut. As your heroes arrive in the devastated city of Elturel, they are drawn into this cosmic conflict.

Key Features:
• Dynamic Storyline: Navigate through the ruins of Elturel and face the wrath of Tiamat's followers.

• Intense Encounters: Battle formidable foes, including drakes and half-dragons, in a series of gripping combat scenarios.

• Rich Lore: Discover the deep history and ongoing struggle between Bahamut and Tiamat, enriched with detailed descriptions and thematic elements.

• Intriguing Puzzles: Solve riddles and navigate a fortress filled with draconic motifs, unlocking secrets and treasures along the way.

• Versatile Integration: Perfect for inclusion in "Descent into Avernus," as a road encounter in "Tyranny of Dragons," or as a standalone adventure.

This product includes:
• 3 Combat encounters

• 3 High-quality maps

• 2 Original monsters

• 3 New magic items, including one artifact.

• 3 Original riddles
